-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | An implementation of Fruit using wxHaskell.
--   
--   This is an updated version of the original wxFruit.
--   
--   wxFruit isn't maintained by original authors, and Haskell.org. There
--   are a few forked versions of wxFruit now. One extension is shelarcy's
--   YaPan
--   (<a>http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=168626&amp;package_id=199138</a>).
--   It added Menu and OpenGL support. And another one is Remi Turk's Juicy
--   Fruit
--   (<a>http://www.cs.uu.nl/wiki/pub/Afp0607/DomainSpecificLanguages/fruit.pdf</a>).
@package wxFruit
@version 0.1.2.1

module WXFruit
data WXRawInput
WXRawInput :: Point -> WXRawInput
wxMousePos :: WXRawInput -> Point
data WXWidgetResp
WXWInit :: WXWidgetResp
WXWButtonCreateResp :: (Button ()) -> WXWidgetResp
WXWTextCreateResp :: (StaticText ()) -> WXWidgetResp
WXWPictureCreateResp :: (Panel ()) -> WXWidgetResp
WXWSliderCreateResp :: (Slider ()) -> WXWidgetResp
WXWButtonCommandEvent :: WXWidgetResp
WXWSliderCommandEvent :: Int -> WXWidgetResp
WXWDeComp :: (Event WXWidgetResp, Event WXWidgetResp) -> WXWidgetResp
data WXWidgetReq
WXWButtonCreateReq :: WXButtonState -> WXWidgetReq
WXWTextCreateReq :: WXTextState -> WXWidgetReq
WXWPictureCreateReq :: WXPictureState -> WXWidgetReq
WXWSliderCreateReq :: WXSliderState -> WXWidgetReq
WXWButtonSetReq :: (Button ()) -> WXButtonState -> WXWidgetReq
WXWTextSetReq :: (StaticText ()) -> WXTextState -> WXWidgetReq
WXWPictureSetReq :: (Panel ()) -> WXPictureState -> WXWidgetReq
WXWSliderSetReq :: (Slider ()) -> WXSliderState -> WXWidgetReq
WXWComp :: Orientation -> (Event WXWidgetReq, Event WXWidgetReq) -> WXWidgetReq
data Orientation
Horiz :: Orientation
Vert :: Orientation
type Widget a b = SF (WXRawInput, Event WXWidgetResp, a) (Event WXWidgetReq, b)
newtype WXGUI b c
WXGUI :: (Widget b c) -> WXGUI b c
wxUnGUI :: WXGUI b c -> Widget b c
wxSF :: SF b c -> WXGUI b c
wxArr :: (b -> c) -> WXGUI b c
decompResp :: Event WXWidgetResp -> (Event WXWidgetResp, Event WXWidgetResp)
compReq :: Orientation -> Event WXWidgetReq -> Event WXWidgetReq -> Event WXWidgetReq
wxGComp :: Orientation -> WXGUI b c -> WXGUI c d -> WXGUI b d
wxComp :: WXGUI b c -> WXGUI c d -> WXGUI b d
wxFirst :: WXGUI b c -> WXGUI (b, d) (c, d)
wxLoop :: WXGUI (b, d) (c, d) -> WXGUI b c
newtype WXBox b c
WXBox :: (Orientation -> WXGUI b c) -> WXBox b c
wxBox :: WXGUI b c -> WXBox b c
wxCompBox :: WXBox b c -> WXBox c d -> WXBox b d
wxFirstBox :: WXBox b c -> WXBox (b, d) (c, d)
wxLoopBox :: WXBox (b, d) (c, d) -> WXBox b c
wxBoxGUI :: Widget b c -> WXBox b c
wxBoxSF :: SF b c -> WXBox b c
wxHBox :: WXBox b c -> WXGUI b c
wxVBox :: WXBox b c -> WXGUI b c
maybeChanged :: Eq a => a -> a -> Maybe ()
data WXButtonState
WXButtonState :: String -> Bool -> WXButtonState
bsLabel :: WXButtonState -> String
bsEnabled :: WXButtonState -> Bool
type WXButtonConf = WXButtonState -> WXButtonState
btext :: String -> WXButtonConf
benabled :: Bool -> WXButtonConf
wxbutton :: WXButtonConf -> WXBox WXButtonConf (Event ())
data WXTextState
WXTextState :: String -> WXTextState
tsLabel :: WXTextState -> String
type WXTextConf = WXTextState -> WXTextState
ttext :: String -> WXTextConf
wxtext :: WXTextConf -> WXBox WXTextConf ()
data WXSliderState
WXSliderState :: Int -> Int -> Orientation -> Int -> Bool -> WXSliderState
ssMin :: WXSliderState -> Int
ssMax :: WXSliderState -> Int
ssOrientation :: WXSliderState -> Orientation
ssSelection :: WXSliderState -> Int
ssEnabled :: WXSliderState -> Bool
type WXSliderConf = WXSliderState -> WXSliderState
senabled :: Bool -> WXSliderConf
sselection :: Int -> WXSliderConf
wxslider :: Orientation -> Int -> Int -> WXSliderConf -> WXBox WXSliderConf Int
data WXPictureState
WXPictureState :: Size -> WXPicture -> WXPictureState
psSize :: WXPictureState -> Size
psPicture :: WXPictureState -> WXPicture
type WXPictureConf = WXPictureState -> WXPictureState
ppic :: WXPicture -> WXPictureConf
psize :: Size -> WXPictureConf
wxpicture :: WXPictureConf -> WXBox WXPictureConf ()
wxmouse :: WXBox () Point
type WXPicture = [Prop (DC ())] -> DC () -> Rect -> IO ()
wxblank :: WXPicture
wxfill :: WXPicture
wxellipse :: Rect -> WXPicture
wxrect :: Rect -> WXPicture
wxwrite :: String -> Point -> WXPicture
wxWithColor :: Color -> WXPicture -> WXPicture
wxPicFill :: WXPicture -> WXPicture
wxPicOver :: WXPicture -> WXPicture -> WXPicture
data WXContents
WXCEmpty :: WXContents
WXCLeaf :: WXWidget -> WXContents
WXCComp :: Orientation -> WXContents -> WXContents -> WXContents
data WXWidget
WXButton :: (Button ()) -> WXWidget
WXText :: (StaticText ()) -> WXWidget
WXPicture :: (Panel ()) -> WXWidget
WXSlider :: (Slider ()) -> WXWidget
type WXPath = [Bool]
contents2layout :: WXContents -> Layout
c2lList :: Orientation -> WXContents -> [Layout]
removeContents :: Frame () -> WXContents -> IO Bool
type WXGUIState = (Frame (), Int, WXContents)
type WXGUIRef = IORef WXGUIState
type WXRHandle = ReactHandle (WXRawInput, Event WXWidgetResp, ()) (Event WXWidgetReq, ())
startGUI :: String -> WXGUI () () -> IO ()
getRawInput :: Frame () -> IO WXRawInput
initSense :: Frame () -> IO (WXRawInput, Event WXWidgetResp, ())
respond :: WXGUIRef -> WXRHandle -> Event WXWidgetResp -> IO ()
actuate :: WXGUIRef -> WXRHandle -> Bool -> (Event WXWidgetReq, ()) -> IO Bool
handleWidgetReq :: WXGUIRef -> WXRHandle -> Frame () -> WXPath -> WXContents -> (Event WXWidgetReq) -> IO (Event WXWidgetResp, WXContents, Bool)
mkButtonProps :: WXGUIRef -> WXRHandle -> WXPath -> WXButtonState -> [Prop (Button ())]
mkButtonCommand :: WXGUIRef -> WXRHandle -> WXPath -> IO ()
mkTextProps :: WXTextState -> [Prop (StaticText ())]
mkSliderProps :: WXGUIRef -> WXRHandle -> WXPath -> Slider () -> WXSliderState -> [Prop (Slider ())]
mkSliderCommand :: WXGUIRef -> WXRHandle -> WXPath -> Slider () -> IO ()
mkPictureProps :: WXPictureState -> [Prop (Panel ())]
pathify :: Event WXWidgetResp -> WXPath -> Event WXWidgetResp
getCurrentTime :: IO Int
ensureTimeElapses :: Int -> Int -> IO Int -> IO (Double, Int)
instance Eq WXSliderState
instance Eq WXTextState
instance Show WXTextState
instance Eq WXButtonState
instance Show WXButtonState
instance Eq Orientation
instance ArrowLoop WXBox
instance Category WXBox
instance Arrow WXBox
instance ArrowLoop WXGUI
instance Category WXGUI
instance Arrow WXGUI
